func.title: PV_Sin

param.name: value
param.desc: Value or value provider to calculate the sine of. The result of PV_Linear can be used to evaluate the sine function linearly over time.

param.name: amplitude
param.desc: Amplitude of result. May be a value or value provider.

param.name: offset
param.desc: Offset added to result. May be a value or value provider. Defaults to zero.

func.desc: The value will is calculates as sin(value) * amplitude + offset with value given in degrees.
func.remark: See the particle documentation for further explanations of the particle system.
See PV_Random for another example with PV_Sin.

example.text: Creates a particle which increases size from 0 to 10 and back to 0 during 100 frames.
